principles.title: Compassion
principles.description: We create a warm, supportive space where clients feel heard, valued, and respected.

principles.title: Inclusivity
principles.description: We welcome individuals from all backgrounds, cultures, genders, and identities, ensuring that therapy is a safe space for all.

principles.title: Confidentiality
principles.description: We prioritize client privacy and trust, following strict ethical guidelines to ensure a safe and secure therapeutic environment.

principles.title: Growth
principles.description: Our goal is to help individuals build resilience, confidence, and emotional well-being through personalized therapy.

HomeCareData.description: Compassionate and confidential counselling for individuals. Flexible, accessible, and tailored to your needs.

aboutUs.title: Who We Are
aboutUs.subtitle: Healing, Growth, and Transformation
aboutUs.mainText: At Nova, we believe in the power of healing, growth, and transformation. Our goal is to make therapy accessible and supportive for everyone, regardless of background or financial situation. We take an integrated approach, combining different therapeutic techniques to tailor support that meets your unique needs.
aboutUs.whoweare: At Nura Counselling and Psychotherapy, we provide compassionate and professional online therapy, ensuring that mental health support is accessible to everyone. Our focus is on individual therapy, offering a safe, confidential space to help clients navigate anxiety, depression, bereavement, stress, and self-esteem challenges. With affordable pricing and low-cost counselling options, we are committed to making quality therapy available to those who need it most

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.review: Nova Consultation has been a lifesaver for me. The therapists are compassionate, understanding, and truly helped me navigate through my anxiety. I highly recommend their services!

testimonials.name: Michael Brown
testimonials.review: I was hesitant about therapy at first, but Nova Consultation made me feel comfortable from day one. Their approach is professional yet personal, and I've seen significant progress in my mental health.

testimonials.name: David Wilson
testimonials.review: Nova Consultation has been instrumental in helping me manage my stress and improve my relationships. The therapists are knowledgeable and genuinely care about their clients.
